html-fundamentals.title: Creating Your First HTML Page
html-fundamentals.description: Put your knowledge to work by creating a simple HTML page
html-fundamentals.instructions:
Create a simple HTML page about your favorite hobby.

Your page should include:

  • A proper HTML document structure
  • A title for your page
  • At least one heading
  • At least two paragraphs
  • A link to a website related to your hobby
  • A placeholder for an image (use "#" as the src)
html-fundamentals.startingCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>My Favorite Hobby</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <!-- Add your content here -->
    
  </body>
</html>

solutionCriteria.description: Make sure you have DOCTYPE, html, head, and body tags
Use the a tag with href attribute
Use the img tag with src and alt attributes
